awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 18 wins & 20 nominations.

fullplot: James Spader is the original Mr. Grey, a seemingly normal lawyer whose relationship with his new secretary (Maggie Gyllenhaal) descends into a kinky affair that would give nightmares to any human resource director.
plot: A young woman, recently released from a mental hospital, gets a job as a secretary to a demanding lawyer, where their employer-employee relationship turns into a sexual, sadomasochistic one.
title: Secretary

tomatoes.consensus: Maggie Gyllenhaal impresses in this romantic comedy with a kinky twist.
